ae38e326-cb19-4f69-af2c-b15dae89d70f:
A layer of jagged ice grows on any weapon you wield.
Benefit: Your melee weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} per shard.
3eed5d77-a7ae-4430-b3ef-1e759c5cd995:
A localized snowstorm rages around you, which makes you a harder target to hit.
Benefit:  All {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made against you suffer a miss chance equal to 5% per shard. If you possess three shards, this chance is increased by an additional 5%.
75ce5127-7e3c-46f8-a90a-c3f5e5a4ce0e:
A portion of the shard's influence extends to your animal companion.
Benefit: Your animal companion gains a profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} equal to four times your number of shards, and all the damage it deals is turned into {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}unholy damage{/g}.
b9d3a06a-20f0-49b8-995b-1ed61609ebd6:
All your vital organs are encased in ice.
Benefit: You become immune to sneak attacks and {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} and gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/{g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil{/g} and DR 5/chaotic.
1e751f13-bdcb-4772-84a3-259ed344fccf:
Not even {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} can grant your opponents peace, for you compel their souls to rake and torture the living.
Benefit: Whenever you kill a living creature, if it leaves behind a body, its spirit, still bound to the flesh, reaches out and and starts tearing apart those of your foes who yet live. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, all enemies within 5 feet of the body take {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per shard. The soul continues to torture itself and others for a number of rounds equal to your number of shards.
2ae0cf69-4e38-4d45-86d4-dff0fd112e9d: Overwhelming thoughts about your own grand purpose cause you to lose focus. You suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects equal to -2 per shard. Furthermore, you are {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} for the entire first {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} of combat.
e4ff021e-1845-4f65-82a2-3dbcc775c6cd:
The aura of evil emanating from you precipitates your foe's demise.
Benefit: Whenever you use an ability or cast a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} with evil, chaos, hex, curse, or {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} descriptor, the target gains one temporary negative level for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
80cd9b74-1e2b-4c6b-987f-f28e2bc892e3:
The cold radiating from you freezes your opponents and hinders their movements.
Benefit: Whenever you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} to a creature, you coat it with a layer of snow. Any fire damage the creature suffers causes the uppermost layer to melt. If a creature accumulates 3 layers of snow, the snow turns to ice, binding and slowing the creature for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. This effect functions as a combination of the {g|SpellsEntangle}entangle{/g} and {g|SpellsSlow}slow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
4c3ad8d1-902c-4c5c-86f2-3d970a15647d:
The icy crust that coats your body explodes into hundreds of icy needles when broken.
Benefit: Whenever you take {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} while under the effect of the Ice Coating shard boon, you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per shard to all enemies within 10 feet of you.
1a33254e-a3d9-4c12-99bb-5752fde57d40:
The negative energy you channel spares no one.
Benefit: All {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}negative energy damage{/g} ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} and are altered as though using the {g|FeatureReachSpell}Reach Spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. Whenever you target an enemy who is {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immune{/g} to negative energy damage with a spell or ability that deals negative energy damage, that enemy becomes {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your number of shards.
c0f5f31f-b03a-4f94-a9f8-14a5068f7f4d:
The power of the shard lets you dominate the minds of weak-willed creatures.
Benefit: Three times per day, as a full-{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}, you can fill a creature's mind with conflicting thoughts and make it fight on your side as if it was your ally. The creature must be within 30 feet of you, and its {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} must not be greater than your level. It will {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability for 3 rounds. After that the creature loses its will to fight and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g}. If you fall {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g} while a creature is dominated this way, that creature becomes hostile once more.
23dfa904-24c6-4e06-b817-3daa96de83fd:
The tips of your projectiles are coated with ice that splinters on impact.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} an enemy with a ranged weapon from the bows, crossbows, or thrown fighter weapon group, your projectile splits into a number of fragments equal to 1 + your number of shards. Each fragment deals damage equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per shard to a random enemy within 10 feet of the target.
75a78155-0251-4927-a907-4b5fbdc41755: Those you interact with are disturbed by the dark glint in your eyes and your predatory smile. You suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} when used for diplomacy equal to twice your number of shards.
6dccd7cf-7c23-419a-a5c7-f881f03a09ce:
Whenever you curse your opponents, you weaken their defenses.
Benefit: Whenever you target an enemy with an ability or a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} with curse or hex {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g}, for the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against that enemy are treated as if they were made with a cold iron magic weapon, and the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} is reduced by an amount equal to your number of shards.
4633d827-4297-4a0d-a3dd-31d0d898dcda:
While fighting alongside allies, you cannot escape the fear of being stabbed in the back. You suffer a -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} whenever you are within 5 feet of any ally. This penalty is doubled if you are within 5 feet of an ally who possesses a shard.
Furthermore, the constant pressure of combat threatens to unleash the chaotic power of the shard the moment you loosen your grip on it. Whenever you make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} or cast a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, there is a 10% chance that a blast of energy will erupt from your body and strike a random creature within 50 feet of you, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}unholy damage{/g}.
5f52556f-1534-42b8-9ddf-1a9a169f6be6:
You can choose to pause amid the chaos of battle to let your fearsome majesty fill your allies with awe.
Benefit: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can exude an air of superiority that overwhelms those around you. While in this state, you are unable to move. All allies within 30 feet gain a profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear effects equal to your number of shards.
1d3039f4-86f6-4109-9d3f-c6a8c362f6df: You gain a +4 profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to cold.
020da064-fa9d-41e6-92e2-de0d90fd4e1a: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 11 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} + your number of shards. In addition, you gain a profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to your number of shards.
8cba0c43-0a8f-45f7-be84-0e27ee69850f: You have acquired another shard, and thus gain new powers.
e391d03c-e9be-4b87-bfb1-7446da74a8cd:
You have grasped every conceivable property of ice and snow.
Benefit: You gain a profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} rolls equal to your number of shards when casting {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g}. You also add the following spells to your list of spells known:
da891b32-da79-4942-918c-b6266da4b20a:
You have learned to summon the weakest of Sithhud's minions and make them serve you.
Benefit: Three times per day, you can summon a number of icebound abrikandilus equal to twice your number of shards for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
3db626e1-1266-473c-ba79-4349af284f51:
You have mastered the element of cold.
Benefit: Any {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} you deal cannot be reduced or prevented by immunities or resistances. In addition, your abilities with cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g} deal additional unholy damage equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per shard (this does not apply to any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast).
4faafc48-7fc4-48b6-aafb-b5eed31f0659:
You have power over the bones of your enemies, both living and dead.
Benefit: Three times per day as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can curse an enemy within 30 feet who has a skeleton and 30 or fewer {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, causing their bones to start growing inside their body. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}unholy damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for 3 rounds. If a target dies while under this effect, its growing bones transform into a skeletal abomination that fights alongside you for 6 rounds.
d1bb93a7-9f2a-452a-ab74-609953b05d55:
You rob your opponents of what little life force they have left and give it to allies who are closest to {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}.
Benefit: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} when you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}negative energy damage{/g}, your living ally with the fewest {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} a number of hit points equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per shard.
8c8ab70c-cebe-43de-9a66-f9d07d4057e4:
Your cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} are as effective as they can possibly be.
Benefit: All spells with cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g} cast by you are maximized, as though using the {g|FeatureMaximizeSpell}Maximize Spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. In addition, the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g} of those spells increases by 3.
c3f4a992-453e-4321-86ce-fe9c2d0fb370:
Your cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} are empowered.
Benefit: All spells with cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g} cast by you are empowered, as though using the {g|FeatureEmpoweredSpell}Empower Spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. In addition, those spells deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} equal to your number of shards per {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}dice{/g} rolled.
140b5c07-ba63-414b-bd75-435f096a874c:
Your icy stare can chill the blood in your opponent's veins.
Benefit: All enemies within 30 feet of you have their {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} reduced by 5 feet per shard and suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throws{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} equal to -1 per shard.
This boon has no effect on undead and constructs.
c74b7b1e-8e28-47f9-baaf-0a1b616efd86:
Your mission is too important for you to fall in battle, and thus the shard grants you the strength to endure in the face of adversity.
Benefit: Once per day when your {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} would be reduced to 0 or less, your hit points are instead reduced to 1 and you gain a number of temporary hit points equal to 40 per shard. These temporary hit points last until the end of combat.
c8f85a1a-9fc0-414f-83a1-814c5bf9f070:
Your projectiles are enchanted with cold that binds the opponent's limbs.
Benefit: Whenever you land a hit on an enemy with a ranged weapon from the bows, crossbows, or thrown fighter weapon group, you deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per shard. This effect can occur twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. If that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} are equal to or less than your level + your number of shards, that enemy is also frozen in place. While in this state, they cannot intentionally move by any means.
6e17e278-89be-4eac-9390-f70814068982:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are charged with cold energies that restrain the enemy's movements.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} an enemy with a sneak attack, that enemy also takes {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}damage{/g} equal to your number of shards. In addition, for the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, any weapon damage you deal to that enemy is turned into {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g}.
c2e75056-e743-40be-8cc7-39f23da7aaae:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strikes{/g} leave ever-growing ice crystals in the enemy's wounds.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} a target with a natural weapon or an unarmed strike, you leave a bleeding wound on its body. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, the target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} bleed damage per shard and 1d6 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} per shard. The ice crystals can be removed with any magical {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g}.
